Henry Smith

  1. Foster Name: Unknown
  2. Foster Family: Cyrus Fisher
  3. Location of Family: Salem, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Falls City, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 8
  7. Date of Birth: 1900-05-17
  8. Date of Death: 1986-07-26
  9. Gender: male
  10. Notes: A letter from Deborah M. (Smith) Crownover to Eloise Thomsen gives the following information: Henry Smith, June 28, 18??-June 29, 1914 Thekla (Junior) Smith, July 6, 18??-July 12, 1915 Children of Henry and Thekla Smith: Cecelia Carolyn Smith, March 17, 1900-May 29, 1967 Louis Smith, Sept. 14, 1905-1926 Henry Smith, March 11, 1907-July 26, 1986 William Smith, April 20, 1908- Helen Smith, June 28, 1910-May 1, 1973 George Smith, Dec. 18, 1911-April 29, 1978
  11. Source: Eloise Thomsen Corres.; Falls City Journal 27 March 1915; National Orphan Train Complex; 1920 United States Federal Census; Archives DB-Clients list.
